columns.Player_ID: The unique identifier for each player.
columns.Sponsor_name: The name of the sponsor supporting the player.
columns.Player_name: The full name of the player.
columns.Gender: The gender of the player, represented by a single character.
columns.Residence: The city where the player resides.
columns.Occupation: The job or role of the player.
columns.Votes: The total number of votes received by the player.
columns.Rank: The current ranking position of the player.

player.table_description: The table consists of player information and their rankings.

columns.Club_ID: The unique identifier for each club.
columns.Club_name: The official name of the club.
columns.Region: The geographical area where the club operates.
columns.Start_year: The year the club was established.

club.table_description: The table stores information about various riding clubs.

columns.Coach_ID: The unique identifier for each coach.
columns.Coach_name: The full name of the coach.
columns.Gender: The gender of the coach, represented by a single character.
columns.Club_ID: The unique identifier for the club associated with the coach.
columns.Rank: The current ranking position of the coach.

coach.table_description: The table contains information about coaches and their rankings.

columns.Player_ID: The unique identifier for each player involved with a coach.
columns.Coach_ID: The unique identifier for each coach associated with a player.
columns.Starting_year: The year when the player began working with the coach.

player_coach.table_description: The table captures player-coach relationships and their starting years.

columns.Rank: The ranking position of the club based on performance.
columns.Club_ID: The unique identifier for each club in the competition.
columns.Gold: The total number of gold medals won by the club.
columns.Big_Silver: The total number of big silver medals won by the club.
columns.Small_Silver: The total number of small silver medals won by the club.
columns.Bronze: The total number of bronze medals won by the club.
columns.Points: The total points accumulated by the club based on medal counts.

match_result.table_description: The table summarizes match results and medal achievements of clubs.
